files.description: Runs the project scaffold generation step (invoking the existing generator if present) and ensures it completes successfully for use in CI/QA.

Validates that required artifacts exist exactly under outputs/ (DRAFT_REPORT_v0.md, CASE_STUDY_RUBRIC.md, TRACKING_RECONCILIATION.md, and an index file) and fails if any are missing or found elsewhere.
Provides a single-command validate target that runs scaffold generation then output validation and exits nonzero on any failure for CI/QA enforcement.

missionDescription: Implement a one-command script (e.g., make validate) that (1) runs scaffold generation, then (2) asserts presence of required artifacts in /outputs (DRAFT_REPORT_v0.md, CASE_STUDY_RUBRIC.md, TRACKING_RECONCILIATION.md, plus any required index), and fails CI/QA if outputs are elsewhere.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete the urgent task identified by Meta-Coordinator

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Creates an enforceable 'no new deliverables outside /outputs' rule via a single-command validation harness that checks expected files exist, preventing further drift and resolving the current audit co...
